sources.title: Arson, Inc. (1949) Action, Crime, Film-Noir | Robert Lowery, Anne Gwynne, Edward Brophy
sources.description:
Sensational expose of the firebug racket! 
An arson investigator goes undercover to break up a ring that sets fires in order to collect the insurance.

Also Known As (AKA): Firebug Squad, Three-Alarm Fire
Director: William Berke
Writers: Arthur Caesar, Maurice Tombragel
Stars: Robert Lowery, Anne Gwynne, Edward Brophy
Genres: Action, Crime, Drama, Film-Noir, Romance

@CultCinemaClassics:
https://www.facebook.com/CultCinemaClassics 
https://www.tiktok.com/@cultcinemaclassics

metadata.Plot: Fireman Joe Martin comes to suspect that fires occurring in the warehouse and home of a furrier may have been deliberately set in order to cover thefts. He goes undercover, pretending to have been discharged from the fire department and appearing to ally himself with crooked insurance man Fred Fender, whom Joe suspects of being behind the arson ring. But Joe and his girlfriend Jane Jennings find themselves in over their heads.
metadata.Actors: Robert Lowery, Anne Gwynne, Edward Brophy
